aka: 威彻尔先生的猜疑 第四部

cast.name: 帕迪·康斯戴恩 Paddy Considine

writer.name: 海伦·埃德蒙森 Helen Edmundson

director.name: 杰弗里·萨克斯 Geoffrey Sax

this_title: The Suspicions of Mr Whicher: Ties That Bind
trans_title: 威彻尔先生的猜疑：同根相连
威彻尔先生的猜疑 第四部
introduction: Whicher follows a married woman through the park in London, where she has a secret assignation with a man. They make their way to a hotel, where they dine and spend the night together as Whicher looks on, troubled. The following day, he heads out to a small town in Wiltshire, to visit Sir Henry Coverley, who has hired Whicher to follow his wife, Lady Jane suspecting her of infidelity.
chinese_title: 威彻尔先生的猜疑：同根相连
foreign_title: The Suspicions of Mr Whicher: Ties That Bind
